title: 110_s3448
content: Cane River National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act of 2008 - Amends the Cane River Creole National Historical Park and National Heritage Area Act to: (1) revise the boundaries of the Cane River National Heritage Area, Louisiana. (2) revise the duties of the Cane River National Heritage Area Commission, and (3) terminate such Commission on August 5, 2025 .
